name: somniaID
description: Real-time reputation NFTs on Somnia Network

scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install && cd ..
scripts.setup:env: cp contracts/.env.example contracts/.env && cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env.local
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:contracts
scripts.deploy: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network somnia
scripts.verify: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/verify.js --network somnia
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/.next frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules contracts/artifacts contracts/cache contracts/node_modules node_modules

author: SomniaID Team
